title: UI Design
description: UI Design involves creating visually appealing and intuitive interfaces for websites and applications, focusing on enhancing user experience through layout, typography, and graphical elements.

title: Web Development
description: Web development encompasses the creation and maintenance of websites and web applications. It involves various aspects such as front-end development and back-end development. So I have worked on Front end development.

title: Progressive Web App Development
description: Progressive Web App (PWA) development combines the best of web and mobile apps, offering users an app-like experience directly through a web browser. PWAs leverage modern web technologies to provide fast, reliable, and engaging experiences across various devices.
